statements.statement: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION1 ( `SID` VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL , `AXTMODIFY` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `REPORTTITLE_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `REPORTNAME_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `RESELLERNAME_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `QUOTATIONNO_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `UNIFIEDNUMBERING_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `QUOTE_DATE_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `COMPACT_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `SHIP_DATE_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `EMAIL_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `PAYMENT_CONDITIONS_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `PHONE_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `COMPETITIVEBRANDS_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `FAX_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `CUSTOMERNAME_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `ADDRESS_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `ORDERTYPE_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `DELIVERYADDRESS_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `OFFERORS_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `ITEM1_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `PRODUCT_NAME1_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `SPECIFICATION1_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `QUANTITY1_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `ONEYEARVALUE1_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `ONE_YEAR_PRICE1_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `THREEYEARVALUE1_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `THREE_YEAR_PRICE1_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `NOAMOUNTTAXVALUEYEAR_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `NO_AMOUNT_TAX_YEAR_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `NOAMOUNTTAXVALUETRIENNIAL_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `NO_TAX_AMOUNT_TRIENNIAL_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `ONEYEARSALESTAXVALUE_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `ONE_YEAR_SALES_TAX_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `THREEYEARSALESTAXVALUE_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `THREE_YEAR_SALES_TAX_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `TOTALVALUEYEAR_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `TOTAL_YEAR_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `TOTALTHREEYEARVALUEPERIOD_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `TOTAL_THREE_YEAR_PERIOD_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `NOTE_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `HEAD_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `SALES_MANAGER_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `ATTN_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `CUSTOMERS_SIGN_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , PRIMARY KEY (`SID`) )

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION1HISTORY ( `SID` VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL , `AXTMODIFY` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `REPORTTITLE_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `REPORTNAME_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `RESELLERNAME_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `QUOTATIONNO_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `UNIFIEDNUMBERING_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `QUOTE_DATE_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `COMPACT_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `SHIP_DATE_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `EMAIL_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `PAYMENT_CONDITIONS_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `PHONE_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `COMPETITIVEBRANDS_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `FAX_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `CUSTOMERNAME_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `ADDRESS_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `ORDERTYPE_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `DELIVERYADDRESS_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `OFFERORS_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `ITEM1_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `PRODUCT_NAME1_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `SPECIFICATION1_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `QUANTITY1_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `ONEYEARVALUE1_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `ONE_YEAR_PRICE1_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `THREEYEARVALUE1_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `THREE_YEAR_PRICE1_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `NOAMOUNTTAXVALUEYEAR_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `NO_AMOUNT_TAX_YEAR_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `NOAMOUNTTAXVALUETRIENNIAL_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `NO_TAX_AMOUNT_TRIENNIAL_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `ONEYEARSALESTAXVALUE_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `ONE_YEAR_SALES_TAX_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `THREEYEARSALESTAXVALUE_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `THREE_YEAR_SALES_TAX_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `TOTALVALUEYEAR_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `TOTAL_YEAR_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `TOTALTHREEYEARVALUEPERIOD_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `TOTAL_THREE_YEAR_PERIOD_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `NOTE_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `HEAD_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `SALES_MANAGER_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `ATTN_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `CUSTOMERS_SIGN_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `MODIFYUSER` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `ACTION` VARCHAR(200) NULL, `UPDATETIME` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )

INSERT RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION1HISTORY SELECT SID , AXTMODIFY , REPORTTITLE_V , REPORTNAME_V , RESELLERNAME_V , QUOTATIONNO_V , UNIFIEDNUMBERING_V , QUOTE_DATE_V , COMPACT_V , SHIP_DATE_V , EMAIL_V , PAYMENT_CONDITIONS_V , PHONE_V , COMPETITIVEBRANDS_V , FAX_V , CUSTOMERNAME_V , ADDRESS_V , ORDERTYPE_V , DELIVERYADDRESS_V , OFFERORS_V , ITEM1_V , PRODUCT_NAME1_V , SPECIFICATION1_V , QUANTITY1_V , ONEYEARVALUE1_V , ONE_YEAR_PRICE1_V , THREEYEARVALUE1_V , THREE_YEAR_PRICE1_V , NOAMOUNTTAXVALUEYEAR_V , NO_AMOUNT_TAX_YEAR_V , NOAMOUNTTAXVALUETRIENNIAL_V , NO_TAX_AMOUNT_TRIENNIAL_V , ONEYEARSALESTAXVALUE_V , ONE_YEAR_SALES_TAX_V , THREEYEARSALESTAXVALUE_V , THREE_YEAR_SALES_TAX_V , TOTALVALUEYEAR_V , TOTAL_YEAR_V , TOTALTHREEYEARVALUEPERIOD_V , TOTAL_THREE_YEAR_PERIOD_V , NOTE_V , HEAD_V , SALES_MANAGER_V , ATTN_V , CUSTOMERS_SIGN_V, '$USERID$', 'UPDATE', NOW() FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION1 WHERE SID = #SID#

INSERT RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION1HISTORY SELECT SID , AXTMODIFY , REPORTTITLE_V , REPORTNAME_V , RESELLERNAME_V , QUOTATIONNO_V , UNIFIEDNUMBERING_V , QUOTE_DATE_V , COMPACT_V , SHIP_DATE_V , EMAIL_V , PAYMENT_CONDITIONS_V , PHONE_V , COMPETITIVEBRANDS_V , FAX_V , CUSTOMERNAME_V , ADDRESS_V , ORDERTYPE_V , DELIVERYADDRESS_V , OFFERORS_V , ITEM1_V , PRODUCT_NAME1_V , SPECIFICATION1_V , QUANTITY1_V , ONEYEARVALUE1_V , ONE_YEAR_PRICE1_V , THREEYEARVALUE1_V , THREE_YEAR_PRICE1_V , NOAMOUNTTAXVALUEYEAR_V , NO_AMOUNT_TAX_YEAR_V , NOAMOUNTTAXVALUETRIENNIAL_V , NO_TAX_AMOUNT_TRIENNIAL_V , ONEYEARSALESTAXVALUE_V , ONE_YEAR_SALES_TAX_V , THREEYEARSALESTAXVALUE_V , THREE_YEAR_SALES_TAX_V , TOTALVALUEYEAR_V , TOTAL_YEAR_V , TOTALTHREEYEARVALUEPERIOD_V , TOTAL_THREE_YEAR_PERIOD_V , NOTE_V , HEAD_V , SALES_MANAGER_V , ATTN_V , CUSTOMERS_SIGN_V, '$USERID$', 'DELETE', NOW() FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION1 WHERE SID = #SID#
statements.select: Select * From RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION1 LIMIT #START_V# , #LIMIT_V#
statements.statement: Select REPORTTITLE_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION1_INPUT WHERE REPORTTITLE_V != '' ORDER BY REPORTTITLE_V
statements.select: Select distinct CONCAT(REPORTTITLE_V) AS REPORTTITLE_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION1_INPUT WHERE REPORTTITLE_V != '' ORDER BY REPORTTITLE_V
statements.statement: Select REPORTNAME_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION1_INPUT WHERE REPORTNAME_V != '' ORDER BY REPORTNAME_V
statements.select: Select distinct CONCAT(REPORTNAME_V) AS REPORTNAME_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION1_INPUT WHERE REPORTNAME_V != '' ORDER BY REPORTNAME_V
statements.statement: Select DEALER_TW_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_DATA WHERE DEALER_TW_V != '' ORDER BY DEALER_TW_V
statements.select: Select distinct CONCAT(DEALER_TW_V) AS DEALER_TW_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_DATA WHERE DEALER_TW_V != '' ORDER BY DEALER_TW_V
statements.statement: Select QUOTATIONNO_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION1_INPUT WHERE QUOTATIONNO_V != '' ORDER BY QUOTATIONNO_V
statements.select: Select distinct CONCAT(QUOTATIONNO_V) AS QUOTATIONNO_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION1_INPUT WHERE QUOTATIONNO_V != '' ORDER BY QUOTATIONNO_V
statements.statement: Select UNIFIEDNUMBERING_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION1_INPUT WHERE UNIFIEDNUMBERING_V != '' ORDER BY UNIFIEDNUMBERING_V
statements.select: Select distinct CONCAT(UNIFIEDNUMBERING_V) AS UNIFIEDNUMBERING_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION1_INPUT WHERE UNIFIEDNUMBERING_V != '' ORDER BY UNIFIEDNUMBERING_V
statements.statement: Select COMPACT_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION1_INPUT WHERE COMPACT_V != '' ORDER BY COMPACT_V
statements.select: Select distinct CONCAT(COMPACT_V) AS COMPACT_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION1_INPUT WHERE COMPACT_V != '' ORDER BY COMPACT_V
statements.statement: Select PAYMENT_CONDITIONS_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION1_INPUT WHERE PAYMENT_CONDITIONS_V != '' ORDER BY PAYMENT_CONDITIONS_V
statements.select: Select distinct CONCAT(PAYMENT_CONDITIONS_V) AS PAYMENT_CONDITIONS_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION1_INPUT WHERE PAYMENT_CONDITIONS_V != '' ORDER BY PAYMENT_CONDITIONS_V
statements.statement: Select COMPETITIVEBRANDS_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION1_INPUT WHERE COMPETITIVEBRANDS_V != '' ORDER BY COMPETITIVEBRANDS_V
statements.select: Select distinct CONCAT(COMPETITIVEBRANDS_V) AS COMPETITIVEBRANDS_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION1_INPUT WHERE COMPETITIVEBRANDS_V != '' ORDER BY COMPETITIVEBRANDS_V
statements.statement: Select CUSTOMERNAME_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION1_INPUT WHERE CUSTOMERNAME_V != '' ORDER BY CUSTOMERNAME_V
statements.select: Select distinct CONCAT(CUSTOMERNAME_V) AS CUSTOMERNAME_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION1_INPUT WHERE CUSTOMERNAME_V != '' ORDER BY CUSTOMERNAME_V
statements.statement: Select ORDERTYPE_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION1_INPUT WHERE ORDERTYPE_V != '' ORDER BY ORDERTYPE_V
statements.select: Select distinct CONCAT(ORDERTYPE_V) AS ORDERTYPE_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION1_INPUT WHERE ORDERTYPE_V != '' ORDER BY ORDERTYPE_V
statements.statement: Select OFFERORS_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION1_INPUT WHERE OFFERORS_V != '' ORDER BY OFFERORS_V
statements.select: Select distinct CONCAT(OFFERORS_V) AS OFFERORS_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION1_INPUT WHERE OFFERORS_V != '' ORDER BY OFFERORS_V
statements.statement: Select ITEM1_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION1_INPUT WHERE ITEM1_V != '' ORDER BY ITEM1_V
statements.select: Select distinct CONCAT(ITEM1_V) AS ITEM1_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION1_INPUT WHERE ITEM1_V != '' ORDER BY ITEM1_V
statements.statement: Select PRODUCT_NAME1_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION1_INPUT WHERE PRODUCT_NAME1_V != '' ORDER BY PRODUCT_NAME1_V
statements.select: Select distinct CONCAT(PRODUCT_NAME1_V) AS PRODUCT_NAME1_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION1_INPUT WHERE PRODUCT_NAME1_V != '' ORDER BY PRODUCT_NAME1_V
statements.statement: Select SPECIFICATION1_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION1_INPUT WHERE SPECIFICATION1_V != '' ORDER BY SPECIFICATION1_V
statements.select: Select distinct CONCAT(SPECIFICATION1_V) AS SPECIFICATION1_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION1_INPUT WHERE SPECIFICATION1_V != '' ORDER BY SPECIFICATION1_V
statements.statement: Select QUANTITY1_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION1_INPUT WHERE QUANTITY1_V != '' ORDER BY QUANTITY1_V
statements.select: Select distinct CONCAT(QUANTITY1_V) AS QUANTITY1_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION1_INPUT WHERE QUANTITY1_V != '' ORDER BY QUANTITY1_V
statements.statement: Select NOTE_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION1_INPUT WHERE NOTE_V != '' ORDER BY NOTE_V
statements.select: Select distinct CONCAT(NOTE_V) AS NOTE_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION1_INPUT WHERE NOTE_V != '' ORDER BY NOTE_V
statements.statement: Select HEAD_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION1_INPUT WHERE HEAD_V != '' ORDER BY HEAD_V
statements.select: Select distinct CONCAT(HEAD_V) AS HEAD_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION1_INPUT WHERE HEAD_V != '' ORDER BY HEAD_V
statements.statement: Select SALES_MANAGER_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION1_INPUT WHERE SALES_MANAGER_V != '' ORDER BY SALES_MANAGER_V
statements.select: Select distinct CONCAT(SALES_MANAGER_V) AS SALES_MANAGER_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION1_INPUT WHERE SALES_MANAGER_V != '' ORDER BY SALES_MANAGER_V
statements.statement: Select ATTN_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION1_INPUT WHERE ATTN_V != '' ORDER BY ATTN_V
statements.select: Select distinct CONCAT(ATTN_V) AS ATTN_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION1_INPUT WHERE ATTN_V != '' ORDER BY ATTN_V
statements.statement: Select CUSTOMERS_SIGN_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION1_INPUT WHERE CUSTOMERS_SIGN_V != '' ORDER BY CUSTOMERS_SIGN_V
statements.select: Select distinct CONCAT(CUSTOMERS_SIGN_V) AS CUSTOMERS_SIGN_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION1_INPUT WHERE CUSTOMERS_SIGN_V != '' ORDER BY CUSTOMERS_SIGN_V
statements.insert: INSERT INTO RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION1(SID, AXTMODIFY, REPORTTITLE_V, REPORTNAME_V, RESELLERNAME_V, QUOTATIONNO_V, UNIFIEDNUMBERING_V, QUOTE_DATE_V, COMPACT_V, SHIP_DATE_V, EMAIL_V, PAYMENT_CONDITIONS_V, PHONE_V, COMPETITIVEBRANDS_V, FAX_V, CUSTOMERNAME_V, ADDRESS_V, ORDERTYPE_V, DELIVERYADDRESS_V, OFFERORS_V, ITEM1_V, PRODUCT_NAME1_V, SPECIFICATION1_V, QUANTITY1_V, ONEYEARVALUE1_V, ONE_YEAR_PRICE1_V, THREEYEARVALUE1_V, THREE_YEAR_PRICE1_V, NOAMOUNTTAXVALUEYEAR_V, NO_AMOUNT_TAX_YEAR_V, NOAMOUNTTAXVALUETRIENNIAL_V, NO_TAX_AMOUNT_TRIENNIAL_V, ONEYEARSALESTAXVALUE_V, ONE_YEAR_SALES_TAX_V, THREEYEARSALESTAXVALUE_V, THREE_YEAR_SALES_TAX_V, TOTALVALUEYEAR_V, TOTAL_YEAR_V, TOTALTHREEYEARVALUEPERIOD_V, TOTAL_THREE_YEAR_PERIOD_V, NOTE_V, HEAD_V, SALES_MANAGER_V, ATTN_V, CUSTOMERS_SIGN_V) VALUES(#SID#, #AXTMODIFY#, #REPORTTITLE_V#, #REPORTNAME_V#, #RESELLERNAME_V#, #QUOTATIONNO_V#, #UNIFIEDNUMBERING_V#, #QUOTE_DATE_V#, #COMPACT_V#, #SHIP_DATE_V#, #EMAIL_V#, #PAYMENT_CONDITIONS_V#, #PHONE_V#, #COMPETITIVEBRANDS_V#, #FAX_V#, #CUSTOMERNAME_V#, #ADDRESS_V#, #ORDERTYPE_V#, #DELIVERYADDRESS_V#, #OFFERORS_V#, #ITEM1_V#, #PRODUCT_NAME1_V#, #SPECIFICATION1_V#, #QUANTITY1_V#, #ONEYEARVALUE1_V#, #ONE_YEAR_PRICE1_V#, #THREEYEARVALUE1_V#, #THREE_YEAR_PRICE1_V#, #NOAMOUNTTAXVALUEYEAR_V#, #NO_AMOUNT_TAX_YEAR_V#, #NOAMOUNTTAXVALUETRIENNIAL_V#, #NO_TAX_AMOUNT_TRIENNIAL_V#, #ONEYEARSALESTAXVALUE_V#, #ONE_YEAR_SALES_TAX_V#, #THREEYEARSALESTAXVALUE_V#, #THREE_YEAR_SALES_TAX_V#, #TOTALVALUEYEAR_V#, #TOTAL_YEAR_V#, #TOTALTHREEYEARVALUEPERIOD_V#, #TOTAL_THREE_YEAR_PERIOD_V#, #NOTE_V#, #HEAD_V#, #SALES_MANAGER_V#, #ATTN_V#, #CUSTOMERS_SIGN_V#)
statements.statement:
Select * From RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION1
REPORTTITLE_V like #REPORTTITLE_V#
REPORTNAME_V like #REPORTNAME_V#
RESELLERNAME_V like #RESELLERNAME_V#
QUOTATIONNO_V like #QUOTATIONNO_V#
UNIFIEDNUMBERING_V like #UNIFIEDNUMBERING_V#
QUOTE_DATE_V like #QUOTE_DATE_V#
COMPACT_V like #COMPACT_V#
SHIP_DATE_V like #SHIP_DATE_V#
EMAIL_V like #EMAIL_V#
PAYMENT_CONDITIONS_V like #PAYMENT_CONDITIONS_V#
PHONE_V like #PHONE_V#
COMPETITIVEBRANDS_V like #COMPETITIVEBRANDS_V#
FAX_V like #FAX_V#
CUSTOMERNAME_V like #CUSTOMERNAME_V#
ADDRESS_V like #ADDRESS_V#
ORDERTYPE_V like #ORDERTYPE_V#
DELIVERYADDRESS_V like #DELIVERYADDRESS_V#
OFFERORS_V like #OFFERORS_V#
ITEM1_V like #ITEM1_V#
PRODUCT_NAME1_V like #PRODUCT_NAME1_V#
SPECIFICATION1_V like #SPECIFICATION1_V#
QUANTITY1_V like #QUANTITY1_V#
ONEYEARVALUE1_V like #ONEYEARVALUE1_V#
ONE_YEAR_PRICE1_V like #ONE_YEAR_PRICE1_V#
THREEYEARVALUE1_V like #THREEYEARVALUE1_V#
THREE_YEAR_PRICE1_V like #THREE_YEAR_PRICE1_V#
NOAMOUNTTAXVALUEYEAR_V like #NOAMOUNTTAXVALUEYEAR_V#
NO_AMOUNT_TAX_YEAR_V like #NO_AMOUNT_TAX_YEAR_V#
NOAMOUNTTAXVALUETRIENNIAL_V like #NOAMOUNTTAXVALUETRIENNIAL_V#
NO_TAX_AMOUNT_TRIENNIAL_V like #NO_TAX_AMOUNT_TRIENNIAL_V#
ONEYEARSALESTAXVALUE_V like #ONEYEARSALESTAXVALUE_V#
ONE_YEAR_SALES_TAX_V like #ONE_YEAR_SALES_TAX_V#
THREEYEARSALESTAXVALUE_V like #THREEYEARSALESTAXVALUE_V#
THREE_YEAR_SALES_TAX_V like #THREE_YEAR_SALES_TAX_V#
TOTALVALUEYEAR_V like #TOTALVALUEYEAR_V#
TOTAL_YEAR_V like #TOTAL_YEAR_V#
TOTALTHREEYEARVALUEPERIOD_V like #TOTALTHREEYEARVALUEPERIOD_V#
TOTAL_THREE_YEAR_PERIOD_V like #TOTAL_THREE_YEAR_PERIOD_V#
NOTE_V like #NOTE_V#
HEAD_V like #HEAD_V#
SALES_MANAGER_V like #SALES_MANAGER_V#
ATTN_V like #ATTN_V#
CUSTOMERS_SIGN_V like #CUSTOMERS_SIGN_V#
order by QUOTE_DATE_V desc LIMIT #START_V#, #LIMIT_V#

SELECT * FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMSTATUS_ALERT
WORK_EVENT_V like #WORKEVENT_V#
statements.update: UPDATE RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMSTATUS_ALERT SET WORK_EVENT_V = #WORK_EVENT_V#, STATUS_V = #STATUS_V# WHERE SID = #SID#
statements.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS NUM FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION1
statements.statement:
Select FAX_NUMBER_V From RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_DATA
dealer_tw_v like #DEALER_TW_V#

Select EMAIL_V From RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_DATA
dealer_tw_v like #DEALER_TW_V#

Select CUSTOMER_CONTACT_V From RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_DATA
dealer_tw_v like #DEALER_TW_V#

Select CONTACT_PHONE_V From RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_DATA
dealer_tw_v like #DEALER_TW_V#

dealer_tw_v like #DEALER_TW_V#

dealer_tw_v like #DEALER_TW_V#

Select SHIPPING_ADDRESS_V From RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_DATA
dealer_tw_v like #DEALER_TW_V#

Select UNIFORM_NUMBERS_V From RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_DATA
dealer_tw_v like #DEALER_TW_V#

Select COUNT(*) AS NUM From RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION1
REPORTTITLE_V like #REPORTTITLE_V#
REPORTNAME_V like #REPORTNAME_V#
RESELLERNAME_V like #RESELLERNAME_V#

THREE_YEAR_PRICE1_V like #THREE_YEAR_PRICE1_V#

THREE_YEAR_SALES_TAX_V like #THREE_YEAR_SALES_TAX_V#
TOTALVALUEYEAR_V like #TOTALVALUEYEAR_V#
TOTAL_YEAR_V like #TOTAL_YEAR_V#
TOTALTHREEYEARVALUEPERIOD_V like #TOTALTHREEYEARVALUEPERIOD_V#
TOTAL_THREE_YEAR_PERIOD_V like #TOTAL_THREE_YEAR_PERIOD_V#
NOTE_V like #NOTE_V#
HEAD_V like #HEAD_V#
SALES_MANAGER_V like #SALES_MANAGER_V#
ATTN_V like #ATTN_V#
CUSTOMERS_SIGN_V like #CUSTOMERS_SIGN_V#
